import React from 'react' import {Card, CardBody} from "reactstrap" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import './newarrival-card.css'; const NewarrivalCard = ({newarrival}) => { const {id, title, photo, price, reviews } = newarrival; const totalRating=reviews?.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.rating,0); const avgRating = totalRating===0 ? "" : totalRating === 1 ? totalRating : totalRating / reviews?.length; return (
New
{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? 'Not rated' : ( ({reviews.length}) )}
{title}
${price}/one item
) } export default NewarrivalCard
